headline: Why Analysts See The Story Shifting For Darden Restaurants (DRI) After New 2026 Uncertainty
summary: Darden Restaurants has seen a small upward tweak to its fair value estimate, with the modeled price moving from about US$220.57 to about US$222.38, even as the underlying research stays mixed on earnings and sales visibility into 2026. That modest lift, paired with a slightly lower discount rate and only minor shifts in revenue growth assumptions, reflects analysts weighing Darden's value discipline and brand strength against concerns about consumer spending and casual dining trends. Stay...
